body.name: Watercolor Birds Note Cards (Stationery)
body.stockDetail: Only 12 left in stock (more on the way).
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 23 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 20 hrs 13 mins
body.description: These cheery note cards are perfect for your personal correspondence!Premium boxed stationery set comes with 14 cards and 15 matching envelopes.Quality card stock takes pen beautifully.Card interiors are blank for your personal messages.Cards measure 5 inches wide by 3-1/2 inches high.Design features brightly colored birds and flowering branches set against a white background.Glossy highlights and embossing make the design pop.Coordinating green envelopes feature matching floral design on flaps.Stationery set comes in a coordinating box with a clear acetate lid.Makes a welcome gift, too!

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #17,175 in Books (See Top 100 in Books) #40 in Stationery (Office Products)

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: When only a handwritten note will do... Brighten their day with a beautiful card!

Premium boxed stationery set comes with 14 note cards and 15 envelopes Delightful details Vibrantly colored birds and branches stand out against a matte white background. Raised embossing lends dimension. Gloss highlights add polish. Superior card stock Inside, you'll find a smooth-finish writing surface — no smudging or streaking. Quality card stock takes pen beautifully. The interior of the card is blank to accommodate your personal message. Matching envelopes included Stationery envelopes in spring green. A detail of the design appears on the envelope flaps. Envelopes are constructed of quality paper. We include an extra envelope...because no one is perfect.

Beautiful note cards are a pleasure to use Versatile design is suitable for a variety of occasions Keep a box on hand for whenever a handwritten note is warranted. Exceptional value Premium boxed set features crisp note cards of substantial stock and stationery envelopes constructed of quality paper. Note card set comes in an attractive box suitable for gift-giving. Stay in touch! Send a little happy their way with a handwritten note. About our Watercolor Birds Note Cards: Set comes with 14 folded note cards with blank interiors 15 matching stationery envelopes Cards measure 5'' wide x 3-1/2'' high Stationery set comes in a matching box with a clear acetate lid
Candy Bouquet Note Cards Happy Birthday Note Cards Folk Art Birds Note Cards Hummingbird Note Cards Sympathy Note Cards Dragonfly Note Cards

Our Company History In 1928, at the age of twenty-two, Peter Beilenson began printing books on a small press in the basement of his parents’ home in Larchmont, New York. Peter — and later, his wife, Edna — sought to create fine books that sold at prices even a pauper could afford. Today, still family owned and operated, Peter Pauper Press continues to honor our founders’ legacy — and our customers’ expectations — of beauty, quality, and value. Image: Peter Pauper Press headquarters, circa 1948.

reviews.reviewText: self sealing and good quality notes

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The cards are beautiful and lively.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty look and great price.
reviews.reviewText: Nice to have note paper on hand. Thank you notes should never go out of style.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality and beautiful.
reviews.reviewText: I love these cards because they are beautifully done with touches of color that stand out and catch your eye. They are simple yet elegant and my friends will love them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Bright and pretty
reviews.reviewText: These notecards are a perfect size for a quick note to a friend. The colorful birds are delightful.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Loved the colorful cards!
reviews.reviewText: I used these for quick notes for all sorts of occasions. Nice card enclosure for gifts. Small writing space was not a problem for me. I have ordered another box with a different front.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very Nice Cards
reviews.reviewText: I was very pleased with these cards, as was my step mom who they were a gift for. They are small, but fine for a quick thank.you note. The birds were bright, vibrant colors, and just like picture.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: absolutely love, i will be buying more from this shop
Me gusta mucho, que son ideales para tarjetas de agradecimiento etc porqie son pequeños, y muy bonitos.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on March 31, 2021
reviews.reviewText: Purchased two boxes of these beautiful note cards. I love the fact that the design has a slight raised embossed feature. Qualaity card and blank inside to write your own message. The envelope is a cheery bright green colour with a motive on the back of the envelope. I have used one box up already. I will purchase a couple of boxes for presents. I will certainly purchase more from Peter Pauper designs. Please note: Look at their other design of a blossom tree which is a softer embossed tree and blossom design. The envelope is pink with the blossom detail on the fron of the envelope and also the back of the envelope. Glad I ordered both designs. You have to see the cards to believe how much thought has gone into the presentation of the cards. Love them. By the way I am a customer, I am not promoting for my own ends.

reviews.reviewerName: Great quality jw pins. You won’t be disappointed.
reviews.reviewText: My wife loves it. Excellent quality cards and bird pictures very vibrant and lovely.

tres joli visuel avec les oiseaux un peu en relief. couleurs vives et tres fraiches. tres beau produit et cartes tres agreables a regarder. cartes accompagnees d'enveloppes d'un joli vert. j'en ai achete 2 boites d'office et je suis tres contente de mon achat.
